songs.title: Forever
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I think I found my girl, if it’s you then holla
I think I found my girl, if it’s you then holla
I think I found my girl, if it’s you then speak to me

[Verse 1]
Girl it’s getting late, the sun's going down
And it’s about time I shake my way across the town
But before I go I just want to say
That you stay on my mind each and every day
I think I'm starting to like the time that we spent
And when it’s building inside, then I can’t pretend
No I don’t want to fight it, I don’t want to hide the way I feel
So I guess it’s time for me to say

[Pre-Chorus]
That I got eyes for you baby
I want us to be together
And if you feel it too
Tell me no one will treat you better

[Chorus]
Cause on nights like this
It’s good to know that you've got someone by your side like this
The more and more you feel like you can live your life like this
And then you say, hope this will last forever

[Verse 2]
Don’t know if it's love, it's too early to say
But if it’s something like it, I just want it to remain
Don’t know if you’re the one that takes a little time
But in the meantime girl, you feeling just fine
Cause the way you look at me never seen that look before
And if it’s a hint of what’s to come then baby can I get some more
Not tryna be too forward
But I think it’s best for you to know

[Pre-Chorus] + [Chorus]

[Bridge]
I think I found my girl, if it’s you then holla
I think I found my girl, if it’s you then holla
I think I found my girl, if it’s you then speak to me
I think I found my girl, if it’s you then holla
I think I found my girl, if it’s you then holla
I think I found my girl, if it’s you then speak to me

[Pre-Chorus] + [Chorus] x2 + [Bridge]
